name: Dragon Quest X
description:
Dragon Quest X is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Square Enix and Armor Project. It was originally released in 2012. It was published by Square Enix. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Dragon Quest X on Nintendo Switch, PlayStation 4, Nintendo 3DS and iOS.
It was produced by Yosuke Saito. It was directed by Chikara Saito and Jin Fujisawa. Koichi Sugiyama scored the game.
